Posts.Content: Mar 29, 2017 10:37PM - edited Mar 29, 2017 10:37PM by Ewagen Thank you MT Woman. Just got DM (Diagnostic Mammogram) and US today and I'm clear. It was a 3mm breast tissue. It hasn't hit me just yet how blessed I am. Thank you for your support.

Posts.Content: Mar 28, 2017 01:11PM - edited Mar 28, 2017 01:11PM by Ewagen hi Everyone. I'm new here. It's 4am and can't go back to sleep. My PD just confirmed my lump. Rubbery and stuck to the tissue. About 1/2 cm. Left breast about where the wire bra is at. I have to wait for a week for US DM. Should I schedule a surgery now with a breast surgeon to remove it? I'm afraid it's BS cuz it's non movable. I'm a mom and healthy and don't have a family history so I'm truly scared. I don't take anxiety meds but I feel like I need to start now
